bug.author: fishfishson
bug.description: I use windows 10 and install labelme by conda. I can use command labelme but I dont know how to use command labelme_json_to_dataset. When I type it on cmd, it tells me such command does not exist.

comments.comment: Maybe this is the same problem as <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wkentaro/labelme/issues/45>#45</denchmark-link> .
I think <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wkentaro/labelme/commit/91154a74e3584967c3e531ecb0078d2a1179366f>91154a7</denchmark-link> fixes this issue. Could you try it?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/wkentaro>@wkentaro</denchmark-link>
Hi there, I am running labelme_draw_json and labelme_json_to_dataset on my mac, but neither of these two work. Both show a " Command not found ". Cloud you help me with this? I installed through homebrew and command labelme works fine. Only these two(for now) do not work.
